1.name: The Matrix
1.description: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

2.name: Fight Club
2.description: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soapmaker form an underground fight club that evolves into something much, much more.

3.name: American Pie
3.description: Four teenage boys enter a pact to lose their virginity by prom night.

4.name: 10 Things I Hate About You
4.description: A pretty, popular teenager can't go out on a date until her ill-tempered older sister does.

5.name: American Beauty
5.description: A sexually frustrated suburban father has a mid-life crisis after becoming infatuated with his daughter's best friend.

6.name: The Mummy
6.description: At an archaeological dig in the ancient city of Hamunaptra, an American serving in the French Foreign Legion accidentally awakens a mummy who begins to wreck havoc as he searches for the reincarnation of his long-lost love.

7.name: The Green Mile
7.description: The lives of guards on Death Row are affected by one of their charges: a black man accused of child murder and rape, yet who has a mysterious gift.

8.name: Star Wars: Episode I - The Phantom Menace
8.description: Two Jedi escape a hostile blockade to find allies and come across a young boy who may bring balance to the Force, but the long dormant Sith resurface to claim their old glory.

9.name: The Sixth Sense
9.description: A boy who communicates with spirits seeks the help of a disheartened child psychologist.

10.name: Never Been Kissed
10.description: A newspaper reporter enrolls in high school as part of research for a story.

11.name: Eyes Wide Shut
11.description: A New York City doctor embarks on a harrowing, night-long odyssey of sexual and moral discovery after his wife reveals a painful secret to him.

12.name: Office Space
12.description: Three company workers who hate their jobs decide to rebel against their greedy boss.

13.name: Cruel Intentions
13.description: Two vicious step-siblings of an elite Manhattan prep school make a wager: to deflower the new headmaster's daughter before the start of term.

14.name: Big Daddy
14.description: A lazy law school grad adopts a kid to impress his girlfriend, but everything doesn't go as planned and he becomes the unlikely foster father.

15.name: Girl, Interrupted
15.description: Based on writer Susanna Kaysen's account of her 18-month stay at a mental hospital in the 1960s.

16.name: Human Traffic
16.description: Five friends spend one lost weekend in a mix of music, love and club culture.

17.name: Magnolia
17.description: An epic mosaic of interrelated characters in search of love, forgiveness, and meaning in the San Fernando Valley.

18.name: October Sky
18.description: The true story of Homer Hickam, a coal miner's son who was inspired by the first Sputnik launch to take up rocketry against his father's wishes.

19.name: She's All That
19.description: A high school jock makes a bet that he can turn an unattractive girl into the school's prom queen.

20.name: Notting Hill
20.description: The life of a simple bookshop owner changes when he meets the most famous film star in the world.

21.name: The Blair Witch Project
21.description: Three film students vanish after traveling into a Maryland forest to film a documentary on the local Blair Witch legend, leaving only their footage behind.

22.name: The Talented Mr. Ripley
22.description: In late 1950s New York, Tom Ripley, a young underachiever, is sent to Italy to retrieve Dickie Greenleaf, a rich and spoiled millionaire playboy. But when the errand fails, Ripley takes extreme measures.

23.name: Sleepy Hollow
23.description: Ichabod Crane is sent to Sleepy Hollow to investigate the decapitations of three people, with the culprit being the legendary apparition, The Headless Horseman.

24.name: Dogma
24.description: An abortion clinic worker with a special heritage is called upon to save the existence of humanity from being negated by two renegade angels trying to exploit a loop-hole and reenter Heaven.

25.name: The World Is Not Enough
25.description: James Bond uncovers a nuclear plot when he protects an oil heiress from her former kidnapper, an international terrorist who can't feel pain.

26.name: The Virgin Suicides
26.description: A group of male friends become obsessed with five mysterious sisters who are sheltered by their strict, religious parents in suburban Detroit in the mid 1970s.

27.name: The Boondock Saints
27.description: Two Irish Catholic brothers become vigilantes and wipe out Boston's criminal underworld in the name of God.

28.name: Go
28.description: Go! tells the story of the events after a drug deal, told from three different points of view.

29.name: Tarzan
29.description: A man raised by gorillas must decide where he really belongs when he discovers he is a human.

30.name: Double Jeopardy
30.description: A woman framed for her husband's murder suspects he is still alive; as she has already been tried for the crime, she can't be re-prosecuted if she finds and kills him.

31.name: Deep Blue Sea
31.description: Searching for a cure to Alzheimer's disease, a group of scientists on an isolated research facility become the prey, as a trio of intelligent sharks fight back.

32.name: Varsity Blues
32.description: A back-up quarterback is chosen to lead a Texas football team to victory after the star quarterback is injured.

33.name: Bicentennial Man
33.description: An android endeavors to become human as he gradually acquires emotions.

34.name: Being John Malkovich
34.description: A puppeteer discovers a portal that leads literally into the head of movie star John Malkovich.

35.name: Toy Story 2
35.description: When Woody is stolen by a toy collector, Buzz and his friends set out on a rescue mission to save Woody before he becomes a museum toy property with his roundup gang Jessie, Prospector, and Bullseye.

36.name: The Thomas Crown Affair
36.description: A very rich and successful playboy amuses himself by stealing artwork, but may have met his match in a seductive detective.

37.name: Austin Powers: The Spy Who Shagged Me
37.description: Dr. Evil is back and has invented a new time machine that allows him to go back to the 1960s and steal Austin Powers' mojo, inadvertently leaving him "shagless".

38.name: Galaxy Quest
38.description: The alumni cast of a space opera television series have to play their roles as the real thing when an alien race needs their help. However, they also have to defend both Earth and the alien race from a reptilian warlord.

39.name: The Bone Collector
39.description: A quadriplegic ex-homicide detective and his female partner try to track down a serial killer who is terrorizing New York City.

40.name: Stuart Little
40.description: The Little family adopt a charming young mouse named Stuart, but the family cat wants rid of him.

41.name: Blast from the Past
41.description: A naive man comes out into the world after spending 35 years in a nuclear fallout shelter.

42.name: Mystery Men
42.description: A group of inept amateur superheroes must try to save the day when a supervillian threatens to destroy a major superhero and the city.

43.name: Lake Placid
43.description: Three people attempt to stop a gigantic crocodile, who is terrorizing residents in Black Lake, Maine.

44.name: The Insider
44.description: A research chemist comes under personal and professional attack when he decides to appear in a "60 Minutes" expose on Big Tobacco.

45.name: Wild Wild West
45.description: The two best hired guns in the West must save President Grant from the clutches of a nineteenth century inventor-villain.

46.name: Drop Dead Gorgeous
46.description: A small-town beauty pageant turns deadly as it becomes clear that someone will go to any lengths to win.

47.name: End of Days
47.description: At the end of the century, Satan visits New York in search of a bride. It's up to an ex-cop who now runs an elite security outfit to stop him.

48.name: Stir of Echoes
48.description: After being hypnotized by his sister-in-law, a man begins seeing haunting visions of a girl's ghost and a mystery begins to unfold around him.

49.name: Boys Don't Cry
49.description: Female-born Teena Brandon adopts his male identity of Brandon Teena and attempts to find himself and love in Nebraska.

50.name: The 13th Warrior
50.description: A man, having fallen in love with the wrong woman, is sent by the sultan himself on a diplomatic mission to a distant land as an ambassador. Stopping at a Viking village port to restock on supplies, he finds himself unwittingly embroiled in a quest to banish a mysterious threat in a distant Viking land.
